meanings.sent1: My phone is upgradable, so I can make it better.
meanings.sent2: The software is upgradable, allowing for new features to be added.
meanings.sent3: The old computer felt proud to be upgradable, knowing it could still learn new tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her skills were like an upgradable system, constantly evolving and adapting.
meanings.sent5: The upgradable car was like a blank canvas, ready to be customized in any way.

meanings.definition: Able to be improved or enhanced.
meanings.sent1: The upgradable software can become even more efficient with updates.
meanings.sent2: His upgradable attitude towards learning ensures continuous growth.
meanings.sent3: The cake was upgradable with extra frosting, making it even more delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her upgradable wardrobe allowed for endless style possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The upgradable garden transformed into a beautiful oasis with each new plant added.
